welcome!

my name is tucker, i am a product engineer based out of NYC 🗽

i’ve been writing software professionally for over 6 years. i currently build products at iggy, a geospatial analysis startup that provides insights for your place data. 🌎🌍🌏

in the past, i’ve written code that powers content moderation tools, highly-available ad-delivery systems, MLS search engines, CVE reporting applications, and hybrid e-commerce stores.

my work focuses mainly on backend web application development, but i have hobbyist research interest in computer vision and AI.

outside of family and work, i enjoy developing my interests:

  • cooking (my current go-to dishes are carbonara and pizza from scratch 🍕)
  • filmmaking (my camara-roll music video project)
  • trail running ⛰️🏃‍♂️⛰️
  • underground electronic music (some of my favorite tunes 💃💃💃)

eventually, i hope this will grow into my own digital garden 💐🌷🌻

this site was built with some minor tweaks of Pool
